weapon_description: A lantern that emits a faint, ghostly glow, contained by a midnight-black alloy that resembles interlocking bones. It is said to have once been revered as a precious treasure by a certain secret organization.
weapon_skill_description: Bloom DMG is increased by 96%, and Lunar-Bloom DMG is increased by 24%. Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam: Lunar-Bloom DMG is increased by an additional 24%.
